original_text: The men of Israel went back to Benjamin and put all the towns to the sword, including the animals and everything else they found. All the towns they came across they set on fire.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람이 베냐민 자손에게로 돌아와서 온 성읍과 가축과 만나는 자를 다 칼날로 치고 닥치는 성읍은 모두 다 불살랐더라

sentences.original_text: The men of Israel went back to Benjamin
and put all the towns to the sword
including the animals and everything else they found
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 찾은 동물과 다른 모든 것을 포함하여

sentences.original_text: All the towns they came across
